title: A Rock climb
creator_credit: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service
brief_description: The film describes the activities of a rock-climbing Explorer Unit from Phoenix, Arizona - the Kachinas. First their equipment and techniques are demonstrated and then the camera records the actual climb of a sheer peak in the Arizona Desert, a peak never before climbed by man.
creator_credit_for_label: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service
